title: Cosmic Altar

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Cosmic Altar is a runic altar in which cosmic runes are crafted upon from pure essence, providing 8 Runecraft experience per essence imbued. Level 27 Runecraft and completion of the Lost City quest is required to craft cosmic runes.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Cosmic Altar
Altar
Released29 March 2004 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestYes
LocationZanaris
OptionsCraft-rune
ExamineA mysterious power emanates from this shrine.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID34766

The Cosmic Altar is a runic altar in which cosmic runes are crafted upon from pure essence, providing 8 Runecraft experience per essence imbued. Level 27 Runecraft and completion of the Lost City quest is required to craft cosmic runes.

Players may create a cosmic tiara here by using either a cosmic talisman or a tiara on the altar whilst having both in the their inventory, granting 40 Runecraft experience. A catalytic tiara can also be created here by using a catalytic talisman and gold tiara, granting 60 Runecraft experience.

Upon entering the Cosmic Altar, the music track Stratosphere plays.

Contents

  • 1 Location
  • 2 Experience
  • 3 Gallery
  • 4 Trivia

Location[edit | edit source]

The location of the mysterious ruins used to enter the Cosmic Altar.

As with most other runic altars, it can either be accessed via the Abyss or the mysterious ruins found in southern Zanaris, just outside the shady grove.

There are two agility shortcuts that allow faster access, one requiring 46 Agility for the medium shortcut, and 66 Agility for the advanced shortcut. Players will take four damage if they fail these shortcuts.

To enter the mysterious ruins, players either have to use a cosmic talisman on the ruins, or click "Enter" on the ruins while wearing a cosmic tiara. Alternatively, a catalytic talisman or tiara can be used.

Experience[edit | edit source]

Crafting 1 essence into a cosmic rune grants 8 experience.

  • An inventory of 28 pure essence grants 224 EXP.
  • An inventory of 30 (small pouch) grants 240 EXP.
  • An inventory of 35 (small pouch + medium pouch) grants 280 EXP.
  • An inventory of 43 (small pouch + medium pouch + large pouch) grants 344 EXP.
  • An inventory of 54 (small pouch + medium pouch + large pouch + giant pouch) grants 432 EXP.

From level 59 on (boostable) there are 2 cosmics created per essence, without giving any additional experience.

This is required for the Lumbridge & Draynor Diary hard task of creating 56 cosmic runes simultaneously.

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • The entrance to the Cosmic Altar.

  • The inside of the Cosmic Altar.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • When a player enters the altar, they are randomly sent to one of the four portals inside.
  • The projectiles that fly throughout the altar resemble Wind Blast.

The '''Cosmic Altar''' is a [[runic altar]] in which [[cosmic rune]]s are crafted upon from [[pure essence]], providing 8 [[Runecraft]] [[experience]] per essence imbued. Level 27 [[Runecraft]] and completion of the [[Lost City]] quest is required to craft cosmic runes.

Players may create a [[cosmic tiara]] here by using either a [[cosmic talisman]] or a [[tiara]] on the altar whilst having both in the their inventory, granting 40 [[Runecraft]] [[experience]]. A [[catalytic tiara]] can also be created here by using a [[catalytic talisman]] and [[gold tiara]], granting 60 Runecraft experience.

Upon entering the Cosmic Altar, the [[music]] track [[Stratosphere]] plays.

==Location==
{{Map|name=Cosmic Altar|align=left|mtype=pin|x = 2407|y = 4376|mapID = -1|height = 275|width = 275|caption = The location of the mysterious ruins used to enter the Cosmic Altar.}}
As with most other [[runic altar]]s, it can either be accessed via the [[Abyss]] or the [[Mysterious ruins#Cosmic |mysterious ruins]] found in southern [[Zanaris]], just outside the [[shady grove]].

There are two [[agility]] [[shortcut]]s that allow faster access, one requiring 46 Agility for the medium shortcut, and 66 Agility for the advanced shortcut. Players will take four damage if they fail these shortcuts.

To enter the mysterious ruins, players either have to use a [[cosmic talisman]] on the ruins, or click "Enter" on the ruins while wearing a [[cosmic tiara]]. Alternatively, a [[catalytic talisman]] or [[catalytic tiara|tiara]] can be used.

==Experience==
Crafting 1 essence into a [[cosmic rune]] grants 8 experience.

*An inventory of 28 pure essence grants 224 EXP.
*An inventory of 30 ([[small pouch]]) grants 240 EXP.
*An inventory of 35 ([[small pouch]] + [[medium pouch]]) grants 280 EXP.
*An inventory of 43 ([[small pouch]] + [[medium pouch]] + [[large pouch]]) grants 344 EXP.
*An inventory of 54 ([[small pouch]] + [[medium pouch]] + [[large pouch]] + [[giant pouch]]) grants 432 EXP.

From level 59 on (boostable) there are 2 cosmics created per essence, without giving any additional experience.

This is required for the [[Lumbridge & Draynor Diary]] hard task of creating 56 cosmic runes simultaneously.

==Gallery==
<gallery mode="packed" heights="160">
Cosmic Altar outside.png|The entrance to the Cosmic Altar.
Cosmic Altar inside.png|The inside of the Cosmic Altar.
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* When a player enters the altar, they are randomly sent to one of the four portals inside.
* The projectiles that fly throughout the altar resemble [[Wind Blast]].
